mapper.select: SELECT supp.slogname, ginfo.gdid,orlist.price,orlist.gdcount,(orlist.gdcount*orlist.price) money,gsize.gstext,orinfo.recipient,orinfo.address,orinfo.contactnumber FROM suppliergoods supp_gds JOIN supplier supp ON supp_gds.ssup_goods=supp.gtid JOIN goodsinfo ginfo ON ginfo.gdid=supp_gds.gdid JOIN orderlist orlist ON orlist.gdid=supp_gds.gdid JOIN goodssize gsize ON gsize.gsid=orlist.gsid JOIN USER JOIN orderinfo orinfo ON orinfo.userid=user.userid WHERE supp.gtid=#{gtid}
